item1.name: Spicy Noodles
item1.description: Rich and incredibly tasty rice dish, made with reduced tomatoes, bell peppers, chili peppers, onions, herbs and seasoning.

item2.name: Shrimp Pasta
item2.description: Fresh shrimp pasta with creamy sauce and herbs.

item3.name: Vegetable Curry
item3.description: Aromatic vegetable curry served with steamed basmati rice.

item4.name: Mixed Salad
item4.description: Fresh mixed salad with seasonal vegetables and a light vinaigrette.

item5.name: Chicken Pasta Salad
item5.description: Grilled chicken tossed with pasta and fresh vegetables in a creamy dressing.

item6.name: Beef Salad
item6.description: Tender beef strips served over mixed greens with a tangy dressing.

item7.name: Paneer Butter Masala
item7.description: Cottage cheese cubes simmered in a rich tomato and butter gravy.

item8.name: Chicken Biryani
item8.description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with tender chicken pieces and aromatic spices.

item9.name: Masala Dosa
item9.description: Crispy rice crepe filled with spiced potato filling, served with coconut chutney and sambar.

item10.name: Samosa
item10.description: Deep-fried pastry pockets filled with spiced potatoes and peas.

item11.name: Pav Bhaji
item11.description: Spiced vegetable mash served with buttered bread rolls.

item12.name: Chole Bhature
item12.description: Spicy chickpea curry served with deep-fried leavened bread.

item13.name: Gulab Jamun
item13.description: Deep-fried milk solids doughnuts soaked in sweet sugar syrup.

item14.name: Lassi
item14.description: Traditional yogurt-based drink, available sweet or salted.

item15.name: Butter Naan
item15.description: Soft leavened flatbread brushed with butter.

item16.name: Tandoori Chicken
item16.description: Chicken marinated in yogurt and spices, grilled in a traditional tandoor.

item17.name: Aloo Gobi
item17.description: Dry curry made with potatoes and cauliflower, flavored with turmeric and cumin.

item19.name: Idli
item19.description: Steamed rice cakes served with coconut chutney and sambar.

item20.name: Vada Pav
item20.description: Spicy potato fritter sandwiched in a soft bread roll.

item21.name: Cold Coffee
item21.description: Chilled coffee blended with milk and ice, topped with whipped cream.

item22.name: Iced Tea
item22.description: Refreshing iced tea brewed with fresh tea leaves, served over ice with lemon slices.

item23.name: Soft Drink
item23.description: Choice of cola or lemon-lime soda served chilled.

item24.name: Chocolate Milkshake
item24.description: Creamy milkshake blended with rich chocolate syrup, served with whipped cream.
